description:
Alexander Lloyds is one of the secondary characters of the series "Tiger & Bunny". He was employed by Apollon Media to serve as the manager of the first Hero duo in the history of Sternbild, composed of Barbany and Wild Tiger. At first, Lloyds favours Barnaby, treating Wild Tiger as a sidekick. A common gag consisted in Wild Tiger complaining about his job and Lloyds telling him he could leave if he did not like it.
[spoiler]After Jake Martinez`s death, Lloyds starts to treat Wild Tiger in a friendlier manner.[spoiler]
name: Alexander Lloyds
